coll-book_creator_intro: <big>With the ''book creator'' you can create a book containing wiki pages of your choice. You can export the book in different formats (for example PDF or ODF) or order a printed copy.</big>
coll-book_creator_help: [[{{MediaWiki:Coll-helppage}}|ꠛꠁꠀꠁꠘ ꠟꠃꠀꠔ ꠡꠣꠁꠎ꠆ꠎꠞ ꠙꠣꠔꠣ]] ꠖꠦꠈꠂꠘ ꠀꠞꠅ ꠔꠁꠔ꠆ꠔꠞ ꠟꠣꠉꠤ ⁕
coll-book_creator_disable_text: ''Book creator'' will be disabled and the book you are working on will be removed.
coll-unknown_subpage_text: This subpage of [[Special:Book|Book]] does not exist.
coll-couldnotaddarticle_msg: The wiki page could not be added.
coll-couldnotremovearticle_msg: The wiki page could not be removed.
coll-download_text: To download your book choose a format and click the button.
coll-download_as_text: To download your book in $1 format click the button.
coll-drag_and_drop: Use drag & drop to reorder wiki pages and chapters
coll-notitle_msg: The title of the page could not be determined.
coll-request_failed_msg: There was an error while attempting to render your book.
coll-save_collection_text: Choose a storage location for your book:
coll-save_category: All saved books are added to the category [[:Category:{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}|{{MediaWiki:Coll-bookscategory}}]].
coll-overwrite_text:
A page with the name [[:$1]] already exists.
Do you want it to be replaced with your book?
coll-load_overwrite_text:
You already have some pages in your book.
Do you want to overwrite your current book, append the new content, or cancel loading this book?
coll-limit_exceeded_text:
Your book is too big.
No more pages can be added.
coll-rendering_text:
Please wait while the document is being generated.

Progress: $1% $2

This page should automatically refresh every few seconds. If this does not work, please press your browser's refresh button.
coll-rendering_finished_text: The document file has been generated. [$1 Download the file] to your computer.
coll-rendering_finished_note_not_satisfi: Not satisfied with the output? See [[{{MediaWiki:Coll-helppage}}|the help page about books]] for possibilities to improve it.
coll-rendering_finished_note_article_rdf: Currently some documents do not contain tables. An alternative may be to use the $1, select "Print" in the browser menu, and use the "Save as PDF" option.
coll-rendering_failed_text:
Generation of the document file has failed.

$1
coll-download_notfound_text:
The file you are trying to download does not exist:
Maybe it has been deleted and needs to be regenerated.
coll-is_cached: • A cached version of the document has been found, so no rendering was necessary. [$1 Force re-rendering].
coll-book_text: ꠄꠈꠣꠘ ꠍꠣꠙꠣ ꠛꠁ ꠘꠦꠃꠇ꠆ꠇꠣ ꠀꠝꠞꠣꠞ ꠟꠉꠞ ꠌꠣꠁꠖꠣ-ꠀꠘꠝꠣꠘ-ꠍꠣꠙꠣꠅꠞꠣꠞ ꠉꠦꠍꠔꠘꠦ ⁕
coll-invalid_podpartner_msg:
The supplied POD partner is invalid.
Please contact your MediaWiki administrator.
coll-suggest_intro_text:
Suggestions are based on the current set of wiki pages in your book.
The list is updated whenever you click on the add or remove buttons.
coll-suggest_ban_tooltip: Remove this page from the list of suggestions
coll-suggest_article_ban: Page $1 has been removed from the suggestions ($2).
coll-load_local_book: "OK" ꠐꠤꠙꠣꠖꠦꠁꠘ ꠎꠥꠖꠤꠘ ꠀꠙꠘꠣꠞ ꠛꠁ $1 ꠟꠃꠀꠔ ꠀꠉꠥꠀꠁꠔꠣ ꠌꠣꠁꠘ ꠎꠦꠇꠐꠣꠞ ꠝꠣꠎꠦ $2 ꠁꠃꠇꠤꠞ {{PLURAL:$2|ꠙꠣꠔꠣ|ꠙꠣꠔꠣꠁꠘ}} ꠀꠍꠦ⁕ "Cancel" ꠐꠤꠙꠣꠖꠦꠁꠘ ꠎꠥꠖꠤ ꠛꠣꠖ ꠖꠤꠔꠣ ꠌꠣꠁꠘ ꠀꠞ ꠄꠇꠣꠘ ꠈꠣꠟꠤ ꠛꠁꠖꠤ ꠡꠥꠞꠥ ꠇꠞꠂꠘ⁕
coll-create_a_book_tooltip: Create a book or page collection
coll-download_as_tooltip: Download a $1 version of this wiki page
coll-add_linked_article: Add the linked wiki page to your book
coll-remove_linked_article: Remove the linked wiki page from your book
coll-add_category: Add this category to your book
coll-add_category_tooltip: Add all wiki pages in this category to your book
coll-add_this_page: Add this page to your book
coll-add_page_tooltip: Add the current wiki page to your book
coll-clear_collection_confirm: Do you really want to completely clear your book?
coll-clear_collection_tooltip: Remove all wiki pages from your current book
coll-load_collection_tooltip: Load this book as your current book
coll-remove_this_page: Remove this page from your book
coll-remove_page_tooltip: Remove the current wiki page from your book
coll-make_suggestions_tooltip: Show suggestions based on the pages in your book

coll-warning-disable-pdf-text: Due to severe issues with our existing system, the Book Creator will no longer support saving a book as a PDF.
coll-notice-download-pdf-text: While the Book Creator PDF rendering is disabled, you can try '''''Download as PDF''''' from the sidebar tools for individual articles.
coll-rendererror-no-session: Book definition not found in session. It might have been discarded due to inactivity.
coll-rendererror-fetch-wrapper:
There were errors while trying to fetch page contents:
$1
coll-rendererror-no-cache: Book data not found in cache. This is most likely an error in the software.
